abstract.t: The development of QoS enhanced IP communication requires an infrastructure that supports AAA services. General accounting and settlement on the intra-domain level and inter-domain level are necessary. As part of the solution to these requirements, this document describes a new COPS outsourcing extension for SIP . A description of COPS objects that have special meaning in the SIP environment is provided. The usage of the COPS extension for SIP is given for clients and servers.
